Unsecured Financing Unsecured financing is an option if you have excellent credit and want a fast loan for up to $25,000 for solar or energy efficiency upgrades. This loan is not secured by your home.
If you would like to apply for this program, please send us the completedget evaluationForm on our website.
Secured Financing for California This option is currently available If you're located in California
Nationwide Secured Financing If you're located outside of California and Texas and have excellent credit and own over 35% of the equity in your home. This loan is a mortgage against your home.
